name: Pov You Are Going To Brazil
name_original: Pov You Are Going To Brazil
description:
I'm going to ask you this question

DO YOU WANNA GO TO BRAZIL?

Sources:

Song: "Overworld Theme" from "Super Mario World"

You are going to brazil: "You’re going to Brazil sound effect" from "Personalized"

Scream Audio: "Me tira me tira noooooo (mario)" from "Re Ku"

Brazil Theme: "Persona 3 OST - That Which Escaped the Darkness" from "Persona 3"

Made With: "Construct 3"
